subject: Issue with product VAM Pro not working
description_text:
Hello Simsonn!

Im really happy with your Products so far!
Been using the Simsonn Pro X Ultra for a couple months and love them.
To enhance my experience further, i ordered the VAM Pro Linear Motors from your company.
I installed them, checked on the Simsonn Software and they dont work.
If i click "Vibration" they dont do anything.

Simsonn Software Version 2.1.2
Simsonn Pro X CPU1: V2.0.2
                           CPU2:V2.0.0

Looking forward to hearing from you!
Incase i can provide more helpful details, just tell me.

Kind regards
Jens Wellegehausen

conversations.body_text: Hi Jens Wellegehausen,     Please follow the steps below to update your pedals: we recommend downloading the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 from the official website and uninstalling your local version to prevent issues caused by incorrect versions.     ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-prox.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.
